I have installed python/cantera.  When I try to run one of the 
python demos I get the error message:

This application has failed to start because MSVCP71.dll was not 
foudn. Re-installing the application may fix this problem.

The error message I get if I run from IDLE is:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Cantera\demos\Python\flame1.py", line 7, in ?
    from Cantera import *
  File "C:\Python24\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\__init__.py", line 8, 
in ?
    from exceptions import *
  File "C:\Python24\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\exceptions.py", line 
5, in ?
    import _cantera
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be 
found.


I've reinstalled both python and cantera but this error still 
persists.  Also, there error doesn't appear when I open up mixmaster.
Do you have any suggestions?

Scott
